name: Deadly Fate
description:
Find your way out of a prison and get back your freedom... maybe.

---------------------------------

Platformer with challenging levels and traps. Focused in jumping precisely and wall jumping through the levels. Jump up throughout the levels and find your way to the top to unveil the dark story behind it all.

---------------------------------

[Features]

5 different levels with different atmospheres and music.

Checkpoints.

Jump and Wall Jump.

Traps.

[Controls]

X -> Jump

Z -> Interact


[Game by]

Diogo Gonçalves

Diogo Neves

Luís Claudino
